law.catch_line: A program shall be subject to:...
law.text:
A program shall be subject to:
The same accountability mandates of the federal No Child Left Behind Act as other public schools in the State; and
The requirements of 20 U.S.C. § 1400, et seq. and § 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, 29 U.S.C. § 794.
